Observed at: Wawa Airport 1:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
